name: Queendom of Felixia
description:
Interactive Femdom Fiction Story Game made using Twine.

Hi, I am Darkinkster, the creator of this game.

The story and the scenarios are 100% made by me.

The majority of the images I use were created by AI.

The short gifs I use are from adult sites and movies. I do not own them; I just edit.

I try to give credit to the artists by buying their clips.

I use shorter clips than the free trailers most of the time.

I cut out big sections of the clips when I edit them.

The audio I use are licensed, and I do not own it. 

This game is fan-made, and never buy it for any price.

The game will always be available for free. You can find it at itch.io or other sites

I may give affiliate links or links to the original creator of the gifs I use so that if you want the whole clips, you can buy them from the official sites.

If you like the game and want to see more please support me at twitter and patreon.

http://www.patreon.com/darkinkster

http://www.twitter.com/darkinkster

Thank you.

Alternative link for download.

https://www.mediafire.com/file/dm5os1f9ty645cp/Queendom_of_Felixia.zip/file
